review_data.title: Great place
review_data.content: I tasted their pumpkin soup which was home made and delicious. On other occasions I went to the bar/party side and the cocktails were good. It's a nice and classy place.

review_data.title: Fun and lovely outdoor dining
review_data.content: Book the outdoor dining for brunch for lovely view of the lake. Beef tartare with a glass of rose is always refreshing in the summer time.

review_data.title: Lovely spot!

review_data.title: Nice but not great, especially in that price range

review_data.title: Fantastic food & deserts
review_data.content: Food here is very good, the deserts are masterpieces!! Quite pricy so if you are on a budget this is definitely not for you. But very good if you are not!

review_data.title: Dinner with friends

review_data.title: A great night out!
review_data.content: lovely food and gorgeous cocktails. Service was excellent. Be warned, it isn't cheap, but nothing this good is!

review_data.title: Divertido
review_data.content: Restaurante com música ao vivo, movimentado, comida boa, bebida gelada, divertido para uma noite domingo.

review_data.title: Off the beaten path but recommended.
review_data.content: It may not be in central Zurich but the food quality is good. Friendly and English speaking staff with good recommendations on wines. Will return for good quality beef steaks.

review_data.title: Great atmosphere, food and service

review_data.title: Service just ok- food, exquisite

review_data.title: Sublime!

review_data.title: Good restaurant.

review_data.title: Great setting but ...
review_data.content: Great setting and nice inside ambiance. Food is tasty and well served but quite expensive. The restaurant is advertised as being in balance with nature but serving almost extinct fish such as gilthead or tuna. Time to change the menu?

review_data.title: food good service hit and miss
review_data.content: The food is generally good if small portions. The service is quite slow and sometimes you had to ask a couple of times for things that should have come naturally, like a missing spoon. Not sure I would chose to go again.
